Class BaseStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • oosysteme.BaseStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Strategy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CalibrateStrategy, DistanceHaltStrategy, FindLineStrategy, ManualControlStrategy, OvertakeLeftStrategy, OvertakeRightStrategy, Pid2Strategy, PidStrategy, ZickZackStrategy

    public abstract class BaseStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements Strategy
    The BaseStrategy each strategy should implement.
